# Ignore intermediate build files
Binaries/
Build/
DerivedDataCache/
Intermediate/

# Ignore saved data
Saved/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.sln
*.suo
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.opensdf
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb

# Ignore project-specific config files that are user-specific
*.user
*.userprefs

# Ignore generated project files
*.generated.*

# Ignore Mac OS metadata
.DS_Store

# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files
*.log
*.obj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.idb
*.ipdb
*.iobj

# Ignore IntelliJ IDEA, Rider IDE files
.idea/
*.iml
*.iws

# Ignore files generated by build tools
.vscode/

# Ignore crash reports
Saved/Crashes/

# Ignore Unreal Engine-specific files
*.xlog
*.xcache
*.tps

# Ignore plugins (optional: if plugins are third party and not under source control)
# Plugins/*/Binaries/
# Plugins/*/Intermediate/
